title: Ram Dass Audiobook Collection
description:
I post this with the realization that the funds derived through purchasing this material help Ram Dass's costs of living and his spiritual work. That being said, I also realize that anyone who happens upon this torrent is doubtfully willing to pay for the material in the first place; so i offer it to those who wouldn't otherwise purchase these materials with the optimism that the seeds that these lectures plant might sprout and encourage some of us to donate our love and possibly some green (money) energy back to the sower who is now disabled by a stroke. 

Namaste!

Please check out these websites to help:

www.ramdass.org
www.ramdasstapes.org

Also, check out the journey these beings went through with "Remember, Be Here Now" on this fascinating blog:
 <a href="
http://www.ramdassnow.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.ramdassnow.com</a>  (page 12 is where it starts from the beginning)
